I want to cuddle them all.

I knew you were dumb, but I did not know you were that dumb!
Every single one of these Sucy's is the real Sucy!
I must have been hearing things.
But man, that was so nice of me.
If you could ride a broom we would be there already!
Judging by your dress, are you going to a movie?
Yes, today is a six feature of the academy series.
Cool, they have actually got a movie theater here.
Let us make a side trip.

Oh, the next one is this year's best in film!
It is going to be perpetually played in theaters.

And now its absorbing some unknown magic power in order to make its desires come true.

Magic history is such a bore.
Maybe she slept so hard she has mushrooms growing out of her bed now.
Sucy, this is no time to be asleep!
There is a forest of mushrooms springing up around you!
She did not even react to mushrooms.
Wake up, wake up, wake up!
It is no good, she is not waking up!
I will go grab a teacher!
It looks like Sucy was doing some sort of plant experiment.
It is against the rules to perform dangerous experiments in the dorms.
We will get yelled at together!
I wonder if that is all that will happen.
When we broke the rules before, we ended up cleaning the troll baths.
After our midnight snack party, we were not allowed to leave for the weekend.
And then when we used summoning magic to order pizza that day, we were suspended for the whole week.
We might be expelled next time...
If you do not, I will cook all the mushrooms you have hidden and eat them!
Crap, she is out like a sack of potatoes!
And how do you like this!
She might be suffering from Sleeping Witch sickness!
It is a witch-only illness where they fall into a long slumber due to using magic.
That is what might have happened to her during that plant experiment.
Okay, Cast a spell to send a sacrifice inside the afflicted witch.
If the sacrifice is able to waken the sleeping witch from within, the illness will abate.
Use the following incantation to enter the witch.
I have never cast it before, and it looks like a really hard spell
Wait, are the mushrooms still growing?!
We need to wake Sucy up as soon as possible!
I cannot cast any magic on you, but you should be able to do it!
I will give it a try!
There should be an antidote somewhere on Sucy's medicine shelf.
If you cannot wake her up, make her drink one of these!
One of them's probably an antidote.
I offer my sacrifice to the confines of this witch!
Wow, so this is what is inside Sucy.
Whoa, it is a parade of mushrooms!
Where you going, where you going?
Meeting here must mean it is my fate to kill you!
What is with this devilish Sucy?
Then that means you are the angelic Sucy?
It would be improper to kill her with such a barbaric instrument.
Did you hear that, you devil?
If you wish to kill her, use a more tranquil method.
No, you must kill her peacefully.
I just came to wake Sucy up.
There should be a sleeping Sucy somewhere in this world.
If I do not beat her awake, then Sucy will never wake up!
Could she perhaps mean the original?
You could say she is the core of our personality.
She is the one in control of this whole world.
I suppose her slumber explains why we have not seen her lately.
Take me to the original Sucy!
What will you do for us if we oblige?
Even if you waken the original, what merit does that impart to us?
If we assist you, will you promise to clean our room, do our laundry, buy us snacks,
and carry our books to class for the next month?
You may refuse if you wish...
You are fine with a promise, right?
Please put your signature on this contract.
If you do not comply, we cannot guarantee your safety.
I cannot tell which one of you is the real devil here.
So, where is the original Sucy?
It would only take a minute by broom!
Not that you can fly one.
The outside world is becoming a mushroom forest?
Sucy's latent abilities are leaking into the outside world...
The whole school will turn into a mushroom farm.
I need to wake Sucy up at all costs!
Sleeping in the middle of the road?
This is the slothful Sucy inside her.
We wish you a happy New Year!
I have never seen Sucy like that before.
The Sucy you normally see is only a tiny part of who she is.
You can find all manner of Sucys inside Sucy.
The Sucy who loves mushrooms a little too much.
Sucy's desire to get plastic surgery.
This is the Sucy who is glad to entertain.
Wow, so Sucy has these kinds of feelings too.
Her idea of entertaining people is way screwed up!
That was the Sucy who wishes to spit on everything in the world.
You do not have the right to remain silent.
You also do not have the right to consult an attorney.
The Sucy court by the Sucy for the Sucy is now in session!
The Sucy who is interested in reading Lotte's night fall series.
Animal babies are like, so cute, you know?
I want to cuddle them all.
I admire the lifestyle of West Coast celebs
Tiny feelings that have just begun to sprout inside Sucy.
Those emotional sprouts are destined to be judged.
She has not said anything yet!
And why is wanting to read night fall or doting on baby animals deserving of death?!
Hey, I was sentenced to death.
It was your fault for speaking out.
I knew you were a moron, but I did not think you were braindead!
Quit throwing insults and make yourself useful for once!
Is that Sucy practicing magic tricks?
Practice for the real thing is over.
That is the kind Sucy from earlier!
I said to knock it off!
Do not interfere with our work!
You cannot just go off killing yourself!
You need to take better care of yourself!
Every single one of these Sucys is the real Sucy!
There, now you are all free!
It feels like I have done a good deed.
I have done a good deed...
See, is not it the best?
Th-Th-There are mushrooms on my hands!
Why is this happening to me?!
Both of you need to hurry and wake up!
But man, that was so nice of me!
We have completed so many events that we must be getting close by now, right?
We have not made any progress!
If you could ride a broom, we would be there already!
Let us hitchhike our way there.

Looking at your outfit, you are going to a movie?
Yes, today is a sextuple feature of that academy series.
Wow, so there is actually a movie theater here.
Let us take a quick detour.
Seeing a movie when you are on a mission?
You cannot go without a bit of meta self-reference sometimes.
This is a movie of Sucy's memories.
It is shown through the lens of her viewpoint.
That means this is how Sucy sees Diana?
Diana would blow a gasket if she saw this!
Hey, who is that supposed to be?!
I cannot believe she was doing that to me!
Oh, the next one up won this year's Best Film.
The theater will never stop showing it.
We did not win, but it is become one of my best memories.
But Diana's team was the one that won...
It is not funny at all!
You are not supposed to laugh at this part!
You do not think it is funny?!
What the heck is that thing?
Humans all live by killing off different parts of themselves.
If everyone lived without killing the parts of them that randomly feel like doing this or that,
the entire world would be filled to the brim with crazies and perverts.
The Sucys you did not let die turned into this unknown creature.
And now its absorbing some unknown magic power in order to make its desires a reality.
The world you are seeing now will become real, and she will become the original.
You mean Sucy will stop being herself?
The only way to stop it is to wake the original.
I cannot tell, so let us just bust in!
Are you searching for the original?
I have been here a long time, for at least a decade.
Oh, wait, I meant eleven years.
We just had some renovations done.
It is like my room is inside a mushroom.
A true mush- room, if you would!
What room is the original in?!
I just went to speak with the original recently.
Just between you and me, there is this weird one with a long neck living here.
It spits wherever it goes, so I asked her to pass on the message to clean up her spit by herself.
It would just make things awkward if I asked her myself.
We are neighbors after all, and I figured the original should be able to handle it.
I believe she was in room 666...
You really piss me off sometimes, but I still like you!
I do not want you to stop being yourself!
Here is the medicine Lotte gave me.
I will just feed her them all myself!
Forgive me, Sucy, but I must feed you mouth to mouth.
This may be your first kiss.
But if you do not wake up, it will also be your last kiss!
No, we are friends, so it should not count.
You are way too loud too early.
We have Professor Finneran's class first period.
Sucy, if you want to read night fall, then you should do it!
Come on, we will be late.
Akko, you promised to carry my stuff for a month.
